text: Amanda Young is a fictional character in the Saw franchise. She is played by Shawnee Smith. At first a minor character in the original movie, her role expanded in the sequels until she became one of the most important characters in the series. She is a close apprentice to main villain Jigsaw. ==References== Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2004 Category:Movie characters Category:Saw (franchise)
title: Amanda Young
